docs.title: 📘 API Reference – HubSpot CRM: Contacts Integration
📥 Check for Existing Contact
docs.text:
Method: GET

Endpoint: /crm/v3/objects/contacts?email={email}

Headers:

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer YOUR_PRIVATE_APP_TOKEN

Description: Перевіряє, чи існує контакт із зазначеним email у CRM.

Parameters:

  • email: email клієнта (наприклад, john.doe@example.com)

Response Codes:

  • 200 OK — список знайдених контактів.
  • [] — якщо не знайдено.

Example Response (no match):

{
  "results": []
}

Example Response (contact found):

{
  "results": [
    {
      "id": "123456789",
      "properties": {
        "email": "john.doe@example.com",
        "firstname": "John"
      }
    }
  ]
}

docs.title: 📝 Create New Contact
docs.text:
Method: POST

Endpoint: /crm/v3/objects/contacts

Headers:

Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer YOUR_PRIVATE_APP_TOKEN

Description: Створює новий контакт із зазначеним email у CRM.

Request Body:

{
  "properties": {
    "firstname": "John",
    "lastname": "Doe",
    "email": "john.doe@example.com",
    "phone": "+380991112233",
    "source": "web_form"
  }
}

Response Codes:

  • 201 Created — контакт створено успішно.
  • 409 Conflict — конфлікт (наприклад, вже існує).

Success Response:

{
  "id": "987654321",
  "message": "Contact created successfully.",
  "properties": {
    "email": "john.doe@example.com",
    "firstname": "John"
  }
}

Error Response (Duplicate):

{
  "status": "error",
  "message": "Contact already exists"
}
